title: Ek Mulakat
subtitle: ਅੱਜ ਆਖਾਂ ਵਾਰਸ ਸ਼ਾਹ ਨੂੰ · اَج آکھاں وارث شاہ نُوں
description: In the poem the poet invokes Waris Shah, a historic Punjabi poet, who wrote a popular version of Punjabi love tragedy Heer Ranjha. Pritam asks to record and witness the miserable condition of Punjab and its people after partition and open a new page of his book of love.
content: Mai chup shant aur adol khadi thi
Sirf pas behete samudra mein toofan tha
Phir samundra ko khuda jane
Kya khayal aaya
Usne toofan ek potli si bandhi
Mere hath mein thamai
Aur has kar kuch dur ho gaye
Haran thi...
Par uska chamatkar le liya
Pata tha ki iss prakar ki ghatna
Kabhi sadiyon mein hoti hai
Lakhon khayal aaye
Mathe mein jhilmilayein
Par khadi reh gayi ki usko utha kar
ab apne sehar mein kaise jaungi ?
mere sehar ki har gali sankari
mere sehar ki har chhat nechi
mere sehar ki har diwar chugli
Socho ki agar tu kahin mile
Toh samdra ki tarah
Isse chati par rakh kar
Hum do kinare ki tarah has sakte the
Aur neechi chhato
Aur sankari galiyan
Ke sehar mein bas sakte the
Par sari dophar tuje dundhte beeti
Aur apni aag ka maane
Aap hi ghut piya
Mai akela kinara
Kinare ko gira diya
Aur jab din dhalne ko tha
Samudra ka toofan
Samudra ko lauta diya
Aab raat ghirne lagi toh tu mila hai
Tu bhi udas chup, shant aur adol
Mai bhi udas, chup, shant aur adol
Sirf dur behete Samudra mein toofan hai...
- अमृता प्रीतम
